poem:
**Degrees of Change**

In Sussex, seedlings of knowledge  
sprout in lecture halls—  
a syllabus of justice unfurls,  
promising hands to heal  
and voices to rise.  
Green skills inked on pages,  
students become leaves  
in an ethical breeze,  
fluent in the language of earth,  
a dialect of justice  
to right the tilted balance,  
signatures in the soil.
